item.title: HackTheBox - Starting Point: Meow Walkthrough
item.description: Complete walkthrough of the HackTheBox Starting Point Meow machine - a beginner-friendly CTF covering basic enumeration and telnet access.

item.description: Learn essential steps to secure your Wi-Fi network from common wireless attacks and protect your data from unauthorized access.

item.title: What is Phishing and How to Avoid It
item.description: Learn to identify and protect against phishing attacks, one of the most common cyber threats today.

item.title: How to Create a Blog: The Complete Beginner's Guide
item.description: A comprehensive, step-by-step guide to creating your own blog from scratch, covering planning, setup, customization, and deployment.
